name: investment-tracker
description: Sistema completo de controle de investimentos

scripts.docker:clean: docker compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.db:migrate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.db:reset: docker compose exec backend npx prisma migrate reset
scripts.db:studio: docker compose exec backend npx prisma studio
scripts.db:generate: docker compose exec backend npx prisma generate
